buy(address,uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Buys the `numToken` tokens for all the msg.value Ether, before `blockTimeDeadline`

params.blockTimeDeadline: The block timestamp when this buy-transaction expires
params.numEth: The amount of WETH to spend. Needs to be pre-approved for the VanillaRouter.
params.numToken: The amount of ERC20 tokens to be bought
params.token: The address of ERC20 token to be bought

constructor.details: initializes the token contract for safe reference and sets the epoch for reward calculations

params.limit: The minimum WETH reserve for a token to be eligible in profit mining
params.safeList: The list of ERC-20 addresses that are considered "safe", and will be eligible for rewards

depositAndBuy(address,uint256,uint256).details: Buys the `numToken` tokens for all the msg.value Ether, before `blockTimeDeadline`

params.blockTimeDeadline: The block timestamp when this buy-transaction expires
params.numToken: The amount of ERC20 tokens to be bought
params.token: The address of ERC20 token to be bought

estimateReward(address,address,uint256,u.details: Estimates the reward for given `owner` when selling `numTokensSold``token`s for `numEth` Ether. Also returns the individual components of the reward formula.

returns.avgBlock: The volume-weighted average block for the `owner` and `token`
returns.htrs: The Holding/Trading Ratio, Squared- estimate for this trade, percentage value range in fixed point range 0-100.0000.
returns.profitablePrice: The expected amount of Ether for this trade. Profit of this trade can be calculated with `numEth`-`profitablePrice`.
returns.reward: The token reward estimate for this trade.
returns.vpc: The Value-Protection Coefficient- estimate for this trade, percentage value range in fixed point range 0-100.0000.

sell(address,uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Sells the `numToken` tokens msg.sender owns, for `numEth` ether, before `blockTimeDeadline`

params.blockTimeDeadline: The block timestamp when this sell-transaction expires
params.numEthLimit: The minimum amount of ether to be received for exchange (the limit order)
params.numToken: The amount of ERC20 tokens to be sold
params.token: The address of ERC20 token to be sold

sellAndWithdraw(address,uint256,uint256,.details: Sells the `numToken` tokens msg.sender owns, for `numEth` ether, before `blockTimeDeadline`

params.blockTimeDeadline: The block timestamp when this sell-transaction expires
params.numEthLimit: The minimum amount of ether to be received for exchange (the limit order)
params.numToken: The amount of ERC20 tokens to be sold
params.token: The address of ERC20 token to be sold

buy(address,uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Buys the tokens with WETH. Use the external pricefeed for pricing.

methods.constructor: Deploys the contract and the VanillaGovernanceToken contract.

depositAndBuy(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Buys the tokens with Ether. Use the external pricefeed for pricing.

isTokenRewarded(address).notice: Checks if the given ERC-20 token will be eligible for rewards (i.e. a safelisted token)

sell(address,uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Sells the tokens the caller owns. Use the external pricefeed for pricing.

sellAndWithdraw(address,uint256,uint256,.notice: Sells the tokens the caller owns. Use the external pricefeed for pricing.
